title: PSA to Riot: Before you make any new champions...
body:
_Please_ work on smoothing out older, outdated, or poor-kit champions like** Nunu, Fiddle, Volibear, Aatrox, etcetera**. I'm sure you guys have something in the works but I think it'd be safe to say that a new champion can wait so that you guys can go back and doctor the unhealthy champs.

With each new champion release power creep is only getting worse.

 Plus,** lots **of these guys need some love, and their mains do, too.

Thanks.

replies.body: They aren't done by the same teams

I think their production schedule is near perfect.

Champion, rework, champion, rework and so on.

There will always be champions with kits we define as out of date, so if Riot only worked on fixing these things instead of new champions we would never see any new champions.

That's just my opinion.
